page.title: 13Adult Opinions of E Kilbride
page.content: ....We have a pleasant shopping centre with reasonable choice of goods though some items require a visit to Glasgow. The neighbourhood shopping centres are also a big advantage for handiness. ....We have many social clubs (often as part of a works organisation) and excellent sports facilities. There are also organisations or classes for just about any hobby one could think of. ....Surprisingly, for a town of its size, East Kilbride has no Bingo Hall as such, though games of Bingo are played in the social clubs etc. ....East Kilbride is only now develop- ing a character of its own. Previously it was very much just a collection of people from Glasgow's overspill but now first generation dwellers begin to feel a sense of identity. ....Most socialising in clubs is very much drink orientated.
